Articles.Content: Anyone really hope the Rhino(and maybe the vector) get a revamp? It was based on the J-2X back when it was used on the SLS Upper stage, but it always looked awkward to me. Maybe make it a little skinnier, smaller nozzle with larger nozzle extention, and maybe an EUS variant for new SLS Replicas? Vector remake will be similar, just maybe with some pipes(i like piping)
Why not use Restock and have every part revamped?

I really like the idea of restock, but personally I like the look of the stock parts better, especially the new ones.

Quote

Why not use Restock and have every part revamped?
